name: Adrian DRUMMOND, Petitioner v. Superintendent SHANNON, D.A. Lynne Abraham, Judge Lillian Ransom, Respondents

parties: Adrian DRUMMOND, Petitioner v. Superintendent SHANNON, D.A. Lynne Abraham, Judge Lillian Ransom, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of June, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED; the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
951 A.2d 264
Adrian DRUMMOND, Petitioner v. Superintendent SHANNON, D.A. Lynne Abraham, Judge Lillian Ransom, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 25, 2008.
